product_name: DAKINE Low Roller Snowboard Bag - Women's
long_description: This rolling snowboard bag fits boards up to 157cm and makes traveling with your board easier than ever with a fully padded compartment for board protection and room for bindings and extra clothes.
short_description: This rolling snowboard bag fits boards up to 157cm and makes traveling with your board easier than ever with a fully padded compartment for board protection and room for bindings and extra clothes.
